author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION REMAINS POORLY ORGANIZED OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...DEPRESSION REMAINS POORLY ORGANIZED OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 AM CST Fri Sep 12 the center of Thirteen-E was located near 16.5, -100.8 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION REMAINS POORLY ORGANIZED OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 AM CST Fri Sep 12 the center of Thirteen-E was located near 16.5, -100.8 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Thirteen-E (EP3/EP132025)
